title: Who am I
paragraph1: My name is Caroline, and I create websites.
paragraph2: I have always enjoyed studying design and creating visual identities for brands. During my career transition, I discovered a new passion: web development.
paragraph3: Today, I combine my affinity for design with my technical skills to create unique and personalized websites for brands and service providers. Each project is an opportunity to explore new ideas and express the brand's personality in a digital format.
paragraph4: In my portfolio, you will find a collection of works that reflect my journey as a developer.
paragraph5: I'm excited to share my work and journey with you
paragraph6: Welcome to my world of design and development!
